name: pnp-graph-connector-dotnet-csharp-json-from-web
title: Ingest JSON content from the web using .NET and C#
shortDescription: This sample contains a Microsoft Graph connector that shows how to ingest JSON content. it scrapes a JSON file that contains every blog post on blog.dan-toft.dk and ingests it to a custom connector making it searchable for everyone.
longDescription: This sample contains a Microsoft Graph connector that shows how to ingest JSON content. it scrapes a JSON file that contains every blog post on blog.dan-toft.dk and ingests it to a custom connector making it searchable for everyone.

thumbnails.alt: External content displayed in Microsoft Search search results, visualized using a custom Adaptive Card

references.name: Microsoft Graph connectors overview
references.description: Learn more what Microsoft Graph connectors are and when you'd use them.

references.name: Build your first custom Microsoft Graph connector
references.description: Learn how to build your first custom Microsoft Graph connector using .NET.
